alert.note: Alert for Appling; Brantley; Camden; Charlton; Glynn; Pierce; Wayne (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Tornado Watch issued January 09 at 1:18PM EST until January 09 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: TORNADO WATCH 5 REMAINS VALID UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING FOR THE FOLLOWING AREAS IN FLORIDA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 11 COUNTIES IN NORTHEAST FLORIDA BAKER CLAY DUVAL FLAGLER NASSAU PUTNAM ST. JOHNS IN NORTHERN FLORIDA ALACHUA BRADFORD MARION UNION IN GEORGIA THIS WATCH INCLUDES 7 COUNTIES IN SOUTHEAST GEORGIA APPLING BRANTLEY CAMDEN CHARLTON GLYNN PIERCE WAYNE THIS INCLUDES THE CITIES OF AMELIA CITY, ANASTASIA, ANTHONY, ARLINGTON, ATKINSON, BAKERSVILLE, BAXLEY, BELLAIR, BLACKSHEAR, BOSTWICK, BURBANK, CARRAWAY, COUNTRY CLUB ESTATE, DOCK JUNCTION, DOCTORS INLET, DOCTORTOWN, DOVER BLUFF, DUNGENESS, DURBIN, FERNANDINA BEACH, FOLKSTON, FRUIT COVE, GAINESVILLE, GAINESVILLE AIRPORT, GARDI, GLYNN HAVEN, HICKOX, HILLIARD, HOBOKEN, HOMELAND, HORTENSE, JACKSONVILLE, JEKYLL ISLAND, JESUP, KINGS FERRY, KINGSLAND, LAKE BUTLER, LAKESIDE, MACCLENNY, MIDDLEBURG, NAHUNTA, NEW RIVER, NEWNANS LAKE, NORMANDY, OCALA, OCALA AIRPORT, OCEANWAY, OLUSTEE, ORANGE PARK, ORTEGA, PALATKA, PALM COAST, PALM VALLEY, PINE GROVE, PLANT HATCH, PONTE VEDRA BEACH, RACE POND, RATLIFF, RAYBON, RIVERSIDE, SAN MARCO, SEA ISLAND, ST. GEORGE, ST. SIMONS, STARKE, STEPHEN FOSTER STATE PARK, SWITZERLAND, THALMANN, WAYNESVILLE, WEIRSDALE, WINOKUR, AND YULEE.
